医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
蜱虫可以被静电吸引到宿主身上布里斯托大学的研究人员发现，蜱虫可以被宿主自然积累的静电吸引到比自身大几倍的气隙中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Ticks-can-be-attracted-to-hosts-by-static-electricity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Ticks-can-be-attracted-to-hosts-by-static-electricity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f691e750-f844-4307-9987-7d6506494066 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 22:59:56 -0400
创伤事件可能对青少年的学业进步产生长期影响经历自然灾害等创伤事件可能会对青少年的学业进步和未来粮食安全产生长期影响；研究人员表示，随着气候变化导致极端天气事件发生频率的增加，这个问题可能会变得更加严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Traumatic-events-may-have-long-term-consequences-for-academic-progress-of-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Traumatic-events-may-have-long-term-consequences-for-academic-progress-of-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e2a361f-3e0f-4a5e-8372-5d02a9416380 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 13:56:29 -0400 Traumatic events may have long-term consequences for academic progress of youth
测试骨质疏松药物加上“骨负荷”运动是否可以帮助老年人安全减肥维克森林大学和维克森林大学医学院将于今年夏天开始一项耗资 700 万美元的研究，该研究将有助于确定阻力训练与骨骼强化练习和/或骨质疏松药物的使用相结合是否可以帮助老年人在不牺牲骨量的情况下安全减肥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Testing-whether-osteoporosis-drugs-plus-e2809cbone-loadinge2809d-exercises-can-help-older-adults-to-safely-lose-weight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Testing-whether-osteoporosis-drugs-plus-e2809cbone-loadinge2809d-exercises-can-help-older-adults-to-safely-lose-weight.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=242928d5-f44d-40b0-9cd6-809e81b9e45b Fri, 30 Jun 2023 13:42:12 -0400 Testing whether osteoporosis drugs plus “bone-loading” exercises can help older adults to safely lose weight
多学科项目有望治疗多动症、脑震荡后综合症和记忆丧失《阿尔茨海默病报告杂志》今天发表了一篇由全国公认的神经学家 Majid Fotuhi 博士撰写的论文，详细介绍了针对注意力缺陷多动障碍 (ADHD)、脑震荡后综合症 (PCS) 或其他疾病患者的多学科计划记忆丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Multi-subject-program-shows-promise-for-treating-ADHD-post-concussion-syndrome-and-memory-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Multi-subject-program-shows-promise-for-treating-ADHD-post-concussion-syndrome-and-memory-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bcd1df9-93f4-453d-8d86-57d566333a0f Fri, 30 Jun 2023 13:33:47 -0400 Multi-disciplinary program shows promise for treating ADHD, post-concussion syndrome, and memory loss
微小的海洋生物为再生和衰老提供了新线索美国国立卫生研究院的研究人员及其合作者发现了对治愈和衰老的见解，他们研究了一种微小的海洋生物如何仅从其嘴中再生出一个全新的身体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Tiny-sea-creature-offers-new-clues-to-regenesis-and-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Tiny-sea-creature-offers-new-clues-to-regenesis-and-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f20d60f9-442c-4b0e-b3e6-582aff65581c Fri, 30 Jun 2023 13:19:21 -0400 Tiny sea creature offers new clues to regeneration and aging
智能套装旨在改善脊髓损伤后的康复一款智能套装有望显着改善严重脊髓损伤后的康复情况。该人工智能支持的解决方案将由埃尔兰根-纽伦堡弗里德里希-亚历山大大学 (FAU) 的研究人员与海德堡大学和海德堡大学医院合作，在未来三年内开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Intelligent-suit-aims-to-improve-rehabilitation-after-spinal-cord-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Intelligent-suit-aims-to-improve-rehabilitation-after-spinal-cord-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=668dcffe-b5c1-4636-9fa4-34fc448a8197 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 13:07:34 -0400 Intelligent suit aims to improve rehabilitation after spinal cord injury
髓鞘质可能对多发性硬化症的轴突有害多发性硬化症 (MS) 是一种严重的神经系统疾病，通常会导致永久性残疾。全球约有 290 万人受到影响，仅德国就有 24 万人受到影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Myelin-can-be-harmful-to-axons-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Myelin-can-be-harmful-to-axons-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f1b0386-8537-4b3f-802b-e88d7f540dd6 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 13:03:00 -0400 Myelin can be harmful to axons in multiple sclerosis
做好寨卡病毒准备：疫苗研究的免疫原性见解研究评估了一种灭活寨卡病毒候选疫苗的安全性和免疫原性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Towards-Zika-preparedness-immunogenicity-insights-from-vaccine-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Towards-Zika-preparedness-immunogenicity-insights-from-vaccine-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a760312e-0d8a-4e43-9e27-4effdbfaeca5 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 09:30:00 -0400 Towards Zika preparedness: immunogenicity insights from vaccine research
新颖的工程方法使蛋白质聚集体适合细胞中的空间操作蛋白质聚集物会在衰老过程中积累，并与阿尔茨海默病、帕金森病或亨廷顿病等神经退行性疾病有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Novel-engineered-approach-makes- Protein-aggregates-amenable-to-spatial-manipulations-in-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Novel-engineered-approach-makes- Protein-aggregates-amenable-to-spatial-manipulations-in-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c476acc1-6149-43f7-a9f5-643cd0d4bea8 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 09:25:54 -0400 Novel engineered approach makes protein aggregates amenable to spatial manipulations in cells
需要在线获得 Plan B 或 HIV 检测吗？ Facebook 可能知道这件事在 CVS 网站上寻找家庭 HIV 检测并不像人们想象的那么私密。 The Markup 和 KFF Health News 进行的一项调查发现，CVS.com 上的跟踪器会告诉一些最大的社交媒体和广告平台客户查看过的产品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Need-to-get-Plan-B-or-an-HIV-test-online-Facebook-may-know-about-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Need-to-get-Plan-B-or-an-HIV-test-online-Facebook-may-know-about-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0a8c96b-b1ec-4973-a23c-f53179eca763 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 09:03:17 -0400 Need to get Plan B or an HIV test online? Facebook may know about it
